column5: Got out friday for a test run in the new rig.  ran dipseys twenty to thirty feet down over fifty feet of water got rewarded with this spawned out rainbow I let the missus have the first fish cause I'm nice like that Saturday was pretty rough out there in the sixteen footer, tried for another hour than packed it in.
Not bad at all for the first trip out in the new Lund ! Thanks for sharing man nice fish too boot as well
Great looking rig. I'll bet you're both looking forward to a full season of outings. First fish in the boat is a laker....I'd say that was a good omen,
Boat is bigger then the truck!  I think you know what your next upgrade should be  :)
I thought the boat was pulling the truck haha, those trucks are brutal on gas for their size, but great off-road and in trails.  Nice rig, nice fish, nice day on the water!
